text.section:
An executive director shall be appointed in accordance with KRS 12.050.
The executive director shall at all times attempt to accommodate the desires expressed by the board of directors.
The executive director shall keep all minutes, records, and orders of the authority and shall be responsible for the preservation of all the documents. The documents shall be public records subject to KRS 61.870 to 61.884, relating to open records.
The staff of the authority, including its executive director, shall be employees of the Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 22, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 21, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000.
